titleproper.value: Guide to the Clinton Mindil Collection on NYU Alumni in World War I <num>MC 68</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2018-12-04T21:41:41</date>

unittitle.value: Clinton Mindil Collection on NYU Alumni in World War I

abstract.value: Clinton Mindil was commissioned with the task of compiling a list of those from New York University who had fought in World War I. Materials in this collection outline through correspondence the process of putting together such a War Record. The collection also includes an edited typescript of the compilation and photocopies of the correspondence and typescript.

p.value: Identification of item, date; Clinton Mindil Collection on NYU Alumni in World War I ; MC 68; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.
The War Record was intended for publication by the New York University Press but was never published.

This collection is comprised of correspondence dating from 1917 to 1936 concerning the creation and status of the <emph render="italic">Records of Alumni and Students who Served in the World War</emph> and the edited typescript of the volume created in the 1920s. This volume lists all the NYU students, faculty, and alumni who served in World War I. Photocopies of the correspondence and typescript are also included.

subject.value: Universities and Colleges -- Alumni and alumnae.
